title: The Unit
description: In a world gone mad, one ordinary, suburban family must find a way to survive. But each member of the Sharpe family must struggle in their own way.The is a former marine and, for him, survival means protecting his family by any means necessary.The is learning just how much she will sacrifice for her children.The was going to go to college. Now, her only hope is to hold on to what's right.The is discovering a brave new world - a world with only one choice to kill or be killed.When survival is on the line, what wouldn't you do for your family?
author: Terry DeHart
